millingParametersCalculatorComponent.calculationHappensAutomatically: Calculation happens automatically as you type.

millingParametersCalculatorPage.title: calculate speeds and feeds
millingParametersCalculatorPage.description: Enter your tool parameters, a few of the operation specific values and let the calculator figure out the missing ones.
millingParametersCalculatorPage.embedTitle: Want to embed this in your website?
millingParametersCalculatorPage.embedDescription: Simply insert the code below into your website's source code. It will load the calculator inside a so called iframe alongside your other content.

itemMillingParametersCalculator.name: Milling Parameters Calculator
